name: ListSipPhones
description:
Retrieve a list of SIP phones on a Zoom account.

Use this tool to list all SIP phones integrated with a Zoom account, specifically for Cisco and Avaya PBX systems. This is useful for administrators who need to manage SIP integrations. Ensure SIP Phone Integration is enabled through Zoom's sales team.

parameters.name: user_identifier
parameters.description: A user's username or email to filter SIP phone integrations for that specific user.

value_schema.description: A user's user name or email address. If this parameter is provided, only the SIP phone system integration enabled for that specific user will be returned. Otherwise, all SIP phones on an account will be returned.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: The number of SIP phone records to return in a single API call. Adjust for desired page size.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token for paginating through large SIP phone result sets. Expires in 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This tokan's expiration period is 15 minutes.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom API.

parameters.name: search_key
parameters.description: A user's user name or email address. If this parameter is provided, only the SIP phone system integration enabled for that specific user will be returned. Otherwise, all SIP phones on an account will be returned.

value_schema.description: A user's user name or email address. If this parameter is provided, only the SIP phone system integration enabled for that specific user will be returned. Otherwise, all SIP phones on an account will be returned.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

value_schema.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This tokan's expiration period is 15 minutes.

value_schema.description: Use the next page token to paginate through large result sets. A next page token will be returned whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. This tokan's expiration period is 15 minutes.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
